thread.title: BRIEF-Baxter Announces Dividend, Additional Share Repurchase

title: BRIEF-Baxter Announces Dividend, Additional Share Repurchase
text: February 20, 2018 / 2:53 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Baxter Announces Dividend, Additional Share Repurchase Reuters Staff Feb 20 (Reuters) - Baxter International Inc: * BAXTER DECLARES QUARTERLY DIVIDEND AND ANNOUNCES EXPANDED SHARE REPURCHASE AUTHORIZATION * BAXTER INTERNATIONAL INC - ‍BOARD OF DIRECTORS ALSO HAS APPROVED A $1.5 BILLION INCREASE IN AUTHORIZATION FOR COMPANY‘S EXISTING SHARE REPURCHASE PLAN​ * BAXTER INTERNATIONAL INC - ‍BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF BAXTER HAS DECLARED A QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND OF $0.16 PER SHARE OF COMMON STOCK​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
